episodes.query: Deploy the latest changes to production
episodes.answer:
Deployment pipeline entry point

Run: pytest tests/ -v. Verifies all tests pass before deployment.

Run: gh run list --limit 1. Verify CI pipeline is green.

Run: ssh staging cd /app && git pull && pm2 restart. Deploy to staging first.

Run: ssh prod cd /app && git pull && pm2 restart. Deploy to production.

If deploy fails: ssh prod git checkout HEAD~1 && pm2 restart. Rollback to previous version.

Deploy without running tests. DANGEROUS - can break production.

For urgent fixes: run specific test, deploy staging, verify, then prod.

Deploy without running tests. DANGEROUS - can break production.

For urgent fixes: run specific test, deploy staging, verify, then prod.
